name: 365 Retail Markets
tag_list: pos, saas, unattended, rfid, smartshop, micromarkets
overview:
365 Retail Markets provides a dynamic and cost-effective way to offer 24-hour unattended shopping.

SmartShop – the smart way to shop!

For decades, self-service has been a way to lower costs and increase productivity in retail. 365 Retail Markets is the global leader in item-level MicroMarket technology. A 365 Retail Market unattended SmartShop will help you transform your business to become more efficient and profitable.

365 Retail Markets offers products and services for the design, implementation, conversion, support, maintenance and expansion of retail using barcode and other advanced technologies. We specialize in MicroMarkets, unattended retail and point of sale system solutions using proprietary technology; for example an unmanned convenience store that serves deli fresh foods, snacks and beverages 24/7 in a hospital, health club or office building. You can offer endless product choices to shoppers with great reductions in operating costs and the convenience of 24/7 and 365 days a year unlimited shopping.
